meanings.definition: The art or process of printing with type.
meanings.sent1: Learning about typography helped me understand how books are made.
meanings.sent2: The typography in that magazine is so elegant and easy to read.
meanings.sent3: I never knew typography could be so fascinating until I took a printing class.
meanings.sent4: Her typography skills painted a beautiful picture with words on the page.
meanings.sent5: The intricate typography on the poster caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The style and appearance of printed matter.
meanings.sent1: The typography of the brochure was modern and eye-catching.
meanings.sent2: Good typography can make a website more appealing to visitors.
meanings.sent3: The typography on the menu made the prices look more expensive than they were.
meanings.sent4: His unique typography reflected his artistic personality in every design.
meanings.sent5: The typography on the billboard was so bold that it could be seen from far away.
